news: [Roadmap] MySQL error based injection using BIGINT and overflow, MS-Access database, WAF tamper, Bruteforce of HTTP Auth, Arabic translation, Command line interface

[Feature] Help the community and translate jSQL into your language. Click on the top right button to show the advanced settings and open menu Community, choose a language using 'I help translate jSQL' and translate some text then click on Send. Your translation will be integrated to the next release by the developer
[In progress] Russian translation, GUI compatibility with Right To Left languages like Arabic
[Swarming] You can contact the developer for any help with Burp integration and CTF oriented version
